name: IMMORTALIST - Movie Night
description:
As part of the Longevity Biotech Conference we have a Movie Evening Program.

IMMORTALIST 

We would like to invite you to a special screening of the first-ever feature film about transhumanism, the longevity community, and cryonics based on a true story. The movie features the legendary Franco Nero as Paolo, a man dying of terminal cancer. His grandson Max (played by Jeff DuJardin), the founder of an anti-aging company, is determined to save his beloved 'Papa' using cryonics â€“ the technique of deep-freezing the bodies of people who have just died in the hope that they can be revived in the future. However, Max's mother (played by Sherilyn Fenn), a single, alcoholic, and wandering Catholic, believes that Max's plan is immoral and barbaric and insists on a traditional funeral. This sets the stage for a battle over Paolo's immortality


Cast 

The legend of the anti-aging movement  Aubrey de Grey played himself there, as well as world-famous actors such as Sherilyn Fenn (Twin Peaks of David Lynch,  nominee for a Golden Globe Award and an Emmy Award), Franco Nero (Django), comedian/actor Paul Rodriguez and Aries Spears.
